@Tim Abbott can you guide me on this (Your e-mail does not match any existing open organization. Use a different e-mail address, or contact jawwad.hussain@xxxx.com
Sounds like you skipped the "create a realm" step

Yup but can you guide me in easy way ??
If you want to change the fact the default ADMIN_REALM is restricted to that domain, you can do it via
./manage.py shell
from zerver.models import *
r = get_realm("example.com")
r.restricted_to_domain = False
r.save()
do i have to put this configuration ? on manage.py ?
